name: FREE TEE w/ A Little Heart Like You
description:
FREE Toddler Tee with purchase! (while inventory last)

"A Little Heart Like You", by Martha's Trouble is a genuine folk-song sounding album of children's lullabies. 

"Dreamland has come and it is peaceful. It's where imaginations fly." -Goodnight Sweet Child by Martha's Trouble.

name: Anchor Tattoo
description:
released 01 February 2011 
The Hiding”, “Red Door”, “Let Justice Rule”, “Why”, “The Sun Will Shine Again” written by Jen Slocumb and Rob Slocumb 
“Love Revolution”, “I Will Wait”, “I Saw an Angel”, “Anchor Tattoo”, “Better Part of Us” written by Jen Slocumb, Rob Slocumb and Chris Rosser. 
“Nothing’s Gonna Stop Us Now” written by Albert Hammond and Diane Warren (Universal Music MGB songs, Albert Hammond Music) 

All songs ©&P(this should be a circle p)ManyMilesMusic (ASCAP) 2011 except “Nothing’s Gonna Stop Us Now” All rights reserved. 

Produced by Chris Rosser and Martha’s Trouble 
Engineered by Chris Rosser 
Recorded at home and at Hollow Reed Studio’s in Asheville, NC 

Mixed by Shane D. Wilson 
Assisted by Erin Kaus 
Mix Coordination by Lani Crump 
For Showdown Productions 

Mastered by Bob Boyd at Ambient Digital, Houston, TX (ambientdigital.com) 

CD Design by Brannon McAllister 
Illustration created by Mammoth PrintShop 
Photo of Jen by Candy Avera, pictureperfectbycandy.com 

Jen sang all songs, did some bgv’s, and some hand shakers 
Rob played acoustic guitars and sang some bgv’s 
River Guergarian played drums and some hand shakers 
Eliot Wadopian played bass guitar and upright bass 
Chris Rosser played keys, mellotron, wurlitzer, organ, acoustic guitars, electric guitars and bgv 
Jacob Blount played banjo on tracks 2, 4 and electric guitar on tracks 6, 7 
Patrick Sweeney played electric guitar on tracks 1, 2, 3, 4, 6, 7, 10, 11

name: Forget October CD
description:

-Cold Rain
